ModMetaData.name: Misc. TurretBase, Objects
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** You must load Miscellaneous CORE first for this to work without errors! ***
-Turret: Weapon Base You want to build your own turrets? Buy an automatic base from a trader and add your weapon of choice to it. The manable weapon base needs the research 'Smithing', the automatic version needs 'Gun Turrets'. -Micro Turret Launcher A launcher with nanobots inside the projectile. Will do virtually no damage, but builds a micro turret at its place of impact. -Nano Replicator (Currently Disabled) Like a 3D-Printer only for much more complex items Needs to be researched.
Special thanks to mrofa for the graphics. (Version: 0.19.1) Language: English, German, Chinese, Korean
Thanks to duduluu and Biscuit now with a translation for Chinese (both)
